'''Radiant Spincrystal 128''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Alucinatio Gloriosa]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is found in the [[Collegium Phonascorum]] by taking a right after going through the entrance nearest the Teleport Waypoint.
